projects.name: Web Based Facial Authentication (Liveness Detection)
details: Developed a facial authentication system as a Chrome Extension.
Enabled passwordless login using live detection techniques.

projects.name: Realtime Chat App
details: Built a React-based web application for real-time chatting.
Integrated Firebase Authentication and Cloud Firestore.
Technologies Used: React.js, Firebase, Bootstrap, HTML.

projects.name: Covid-19 Tracker
details: Developed a tracker for daily and weekly COVID-19 statistics.
Used Google Maps API and live datasets for visualization.
Technologies Used: JavaScript, CSS, HTML, API.
Worked with EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, IAM, VPC.
Designed scalable and fault-tolerant AWS solutions.
Hands-on with AWS CLI and Management Console.
